statements: SELECT * FROM trading_positions;
SELECT instrument_name, quantity FROM trading_positions WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT position_id, instrument_name, market_price FROM trading_positions WHERE market_price < 1000;
SELECT instrument_name, quantity, exposure FROM trading_positions WHERE risk_factor > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM trading_positions ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_positions WHERE instrument_name = 'AAPL';
SELECT position_id, instrument_name, quantity FROM trading_positions WHERE quantity > 1000 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, market_price, exposure FROM trading_positions WHERE exposure > 5000 AND market_price < 100 ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT SUM(exposure) AS total_exposure, AVG(market_price) AS avg_price FROM trading_positions;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_positions FROM trading_positions WHERE risk_factor > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM positions
SELECT security_name, quantity FROM positions WHERE price > 100
SELECT position_id, security_name FROM positions ORDER BY security_name DESC
SELECT * FROM exposures WHERE amount < 5000
SELECT position_id, risk_category FROM exposures WHERE risk_category = 'High'
SELECT * FROM positions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY security_name DESC;
SELECT security_name, price FROM positions WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT AVG(quantity), MAX(price) FROM positions WHERE security_name LIKE 'AAPL%';
SELECT position_id, amount FROM exposures JOIN positions ON exposures.position_id = positions.position_id WHERE risk_category = 'High Risk' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT security_name FROM positions WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM trading_positions;
SELECT position_id, asset_id, quantity FROM trading_positions WHERE trade_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT position_id, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_value FROM trading_positions GROUP BY position_id;
SELECT e.position_id, r.var, r.cvar FROM exposures e JOIN risk_metrics r ON e.exposure_id = r.exposure_id;
SELECT exposure_type, AVG(exposure_amount) AS avg_exposure FROM exposures GROUP BY exposure_type;
SELECT * FROM trading_positions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT position_id, asset_id, price FROM trading_positions WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT t.position_id, e.exposure_amount FROM trading_positions t INNER JOIN exposures e ON t.position_id = e.position_id WHERE e.exposure_amount > 5000;

SELECT t.position_id, e.exposure_type, r.var FROM exposures e INNER JOIN risk_metrics r ON e.exposure_id = r.exposure_id INNER JOIN trading_positions t ON e.position_id = t.position_id WHERE r.var > 100;

SELECT DISTINCT t.asset_id, t.quantity, e.exposure_amount, r.cvar FROM trading_positions t INNER JOIN exposures e ON t.position_id = e.position_id INNER JOIN risk_metrics r ON e.exposure_id = r.exposure_id ORDER BY t.asset_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM positions;
SELECT security_name, quantity FROM positions WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT security_name, book_value FROM positions ORDER BY book_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM exposures WHERE exposure_type = 'Equity';
SELECT position_id, VaR, expected_shortfall FROM risk_metrics WHERE confidence_level >= 0.95;
SELECT * FROM positions;
SELECT security_name, quantity FROM positions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT position_id, security_name, book_value FROM positions JOIN exposures ON positions.position_id = exposures.position_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT position_id, VaR, expected_shortfall FROM risk_metrics WHERE confidence_level > 0.95 ORDER BY expected_shortfall DESC;
SELECT * FROM positions;
SELECT security_symbol, quantity, price FROM positions WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT position_id, security_symbol FROM positions ORDER BY security_symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM exposures WHERE value > 5000 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT position_id, risk_category, metric_type FROM exposures JOIN risk_metrics ON exposures.exposure_id = risk_metrics.exposure_id;
SELECT * FROM positions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT security_symbol, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM positions GROUP BY security_symbol;

SELECT p.*, e.risk_category, r.metric_type, v.risk_level FROM positions p JOIN exposures e ON p.position_id = e.position_id JOIN risk_metrics r ON e.exposure_id = r.exposure_id JOIN var_parameters v ON r.metric_id = v.var_id WHERE p.quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM var_results vr JOIN var_parameters vp ON vr.var_id = vp.var_id WHERE vp.confidence_level > 0.95;

SELECT p.position_id, e.exposure_id, r.metric_id, v.var_id, vr.result_id FROM positions p LEFT JOIN exposures e ON p.position_id = e.position_id LEFT JOIN risk_metrics r ON e.exposure_id = r.exposure_id LEFT JOIN var_parameters v ON r.metric_id = v.var_id LEFT JOIN var_results vr ON v.var_id = vr.var_id;
